content: It's not the correct forum and we don't really want 'candidate' posts sent here either so we can filter and ensure requests for resources are appropriately and consistently described. Please send a PM to @Grahame Grieve.
how possible is it to search by extensions in hapi-fhir
Probably best to ask this on #hapi. Also, be sure to start a new thread if your question isn't related to the topic you're looking at when you post.
